desc: 测试更新出差本表，带子属性，不含子表的案例
name: UpdateTravelSelfProperties
desc: 测试点：简单的更新，不含子表

oqls.desc: 根据记录ID更新出差记录，含出差人（仅父属性）
oqls.name: UpdateTravelModifierById
oqls.oql: update Travel set modifier = {"name": "王五", "key": "wangwu"} where applyId = '434743DSS-FEL3232-323KLFJFDS-323FDSD'
oqls.sql: update TRAVEL set MODIFIER_NAME = '王五', MODIFIER_KEY = 'wangwu' where APPLY_ID = '434743DSS-FEL3232-323KLFJFDS-323FDSD'

oqls.desc: 根据记录ID更新出差记录，含出差人（仅父属性）（带变量）
oqls.name: UpdateTravelModifierByIdVars
oqls.oql: update Travel set modifier = #{modifier} where applyId = #{applyId}
oqls.sql: update TRAVEL set MODIFIER_NAME = #{modifier.name}, MODIFIER_KEY = #{modifier.key} where APPLY_ID = #{applyId}

oqls.desc: 根据记录ID更新出差记录，含出差人（子属性展开）
oqls.name: UpdateTravelExpandModifierById
oqls.oql: update Travel set modifier(name, key) = {"name": "王五", "key": "wangwu"} where applyId = '434743DSS-FEL3232-323KLFJFDS-323FDSD'
oqls.sql: update TRAVEL set MODIFIER_NAME = '王五', MODIFIER_KEY = 'wangwu' where APPLY_ID = '434743DSS-FEL3232-323KLFJFDS-323FDSD'

oqls.desc: 根据记录ID更新出差记录，含出差人（子属性展开）（带变量）
oqls.name: UpdateTravelExpandModifierByIdVars
oqls.oql: update Travel set modifier(name, key) = #{modifier} where applyId = #{applyId}
oqls.sql: update TRAVEL set MODIFIER_NAME = #{modifier.name}, MODIFIER_KEY = #{modifier.key} where APPLY_ID = #{applyId}

oqls.desc: 根据记录ID更新出差记录，含出差人（子属性单独）
oqls.name: UpdateTravelSingleModifierById
oqls.oql: update Travel set modifier(name, key) = {"name": "王五", "key": "wangwu"} where applyId = '434743DSS-FEL3232-323KLFJFDS-323FDSD'
oqls.sql: update TRAVEL set MODIFIER_NAME = '王五', MODIFIER_KEY = 'wangwu' where APPLY_ID = '434743DSS-FEL3232-323KLFJFDS-323FDSD'

oqls.desc: 根据记录ID更新出差记录，含出差人（子属性单独）（带变量）
oqls.name: UpdateTravelSingleModifierByIdVars
oqls.oql: update Travel set modifier.name = #{modifier.name}, modifier.key = #{modifier.key} where applyId = #{applyId}
oqls.sql: update TRAVEL set MODIFIER_NAME = #{modifier.name}, MODIFIER_KEY = #{modifier.key} where APPLY_ID = #{applyId}

oqls.desc: 根据记录ID更新出差记录，含多个附件出差人（仅父属性）（带变量）
oqls.name: UpdateTravelWithAttachesByIdVars
oqls.oql: update Travel set attaches = #{attaches} where applyId = #{applyId}
oqls.sql: update TRAVEL set ATTACH_NAMES = #{attaches.name}, ATTACH_KEYS = #{attaches.key} where APPLY_ID = #{applyId}
